Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Encephalopathy \En*ceph`a*lop"a*thy\, n. [Gr. 'egke`falos the brain + pa`schein, paqei^n, to suffer.] (Med.) Any disease or symptoms of disease referable to disorders of the brain; as, lead encephalopathy, the cerebral symptoms attending chronic lead poisoning. [1913 Webster]
encephalopathy n : any disorder or disease of the brain [syn: {brain disorder}, {brain disease}]
